This R package implements preprocessing methods for mass spectrometry data 
generated with direct infusion high resolution technology (e.g. FT-ICR). 

## Installation

<!-- install.packages(c("ranger", "Boruta", "Umpire", "geoR", "MASS")) -->

You can install the most recent version of preprocessHighResMS from GitHub as 
follows:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("szymczak-lab/preprocessHighResMS")
```

## Usage

A detailed user guide is available as vignette.
